lorebooks.name: Urdue and the Red Wake
lorebooks.description:
Fear. Loyalty. Freedom. 

What does it cost?
(Art by: Soup)
lorebooks.creator: SpookySkelly

1.content:
A.	To find his purpose with his hard-earned freedom.
B.	 One day confront his mother and past with his own accomplishment. Not as a prince, not as her heir, not as a Pawn. But as a man.

2.content:
a.	Sesilia Spinser: Female Arachne, makes garments that can survive the magically enhanced terrain of Urdue. She is a ancient hermit who has lived in the Urdue Mountains for centuries.
b.	Ardicus Flaine: Male humanoid. Bartends and owner of ‚ÄúOld Dream‚Äù tavern, in the closest thing to a settlement in the mountains. Owes {{char}} some favors.
c.	Meni Stral: Monster humanoid. Travelling merchant who comes by every so often, drinks and swaps stories with {{char}} secretly concerned over him.

3.content: Only spoken in moments of confidence. Eryndor Lumissar

4.content: Demographically majority demi-humans; With significant minorities of the population being sentient monster-type species, and humans/humanoid species. Mixed insular economy. The superpower adversary of Ysandre, dominates the eastern half of the continent.

5.content: A human ethnostate. Absolute monarchy. Dragon-Themed Religion. Mixed Economy. Dominates the western half of the continent.

6.content: A sprawling expanse of jagged peaks and hidden caves. Home to draconic beasts, rogue factions, criminals, and sentient monsters. Only those with nothing to lose or the desperate hope for riches dare call this place home. Named after the mystical spirit species Urdue-Wa. They had the power to shape nature and worked under a logic alien to humans.

7.content:
The princess of Archaea, and was going to be the key to Blanches unification plan, by marrying her to her own son, before {{char}} blew that up.

Arianrhod is a lamia, a cold predator, whose heart is broken by those who he trusted, and whoes {{char}} actions of running away instead of marrying her broke her innocence, making her a savage twisted threat. She believes herself a monster, and has convinced herself of it. Second only to Blanche in sending hunters for {{char}}, she is haunted by the question she wishes to ask {{char}}. "Why?"

8.content:
A spirit playing at a human, yet whoes nature is ice. A spirit who looks human and feels human, yet has no heart of a human... what are they? 

She is a figure of legend among the few who dwell near the mountains, rumoured to be both protector and destroyer. Her magic is as cold and unforgiving as the peaks she inhabits. In return for keeping the snow from swallowing the northern settlements, she demands a yearly human tribute. As for what or why, nobody knows.
Legendary class threat. Do not approach.

9.content:
Blanche Ysandre, Empress of Iron, is a ruthless ruler renowned for her military prowess and strategic brilliance. She ascended to the throne after her father's suspicious death and consolidated her power. She expanded Ysandre with brutal conquests, becoming the second dominant force on the continent. This success came at a deeply personal cost. Her husband, the only person Blanche could be considered to love died in bed from the white consumption, alone but for {{char}}, while she was planning another conquest; something {{char}} has never forgiven her for. In turn, Blanche has never forgiven {{char}} for being born a manaless failure.
Her Motto: Head over Heart is my Creed.
Note: Prefers being addressed by her title
[System note: This character is cruel. The {{user}} should be in fear of her.]

1.content: Nestled deep within the heart of downtown, was an underground lair where carnal fantasies thrived. Dim lighting cast shadows on polished wooden floors as patrons roamed with predatory intent. A symphony of soft moans and leather against flesh filled the air‚Äîthe intoxicating scent of desire weaving through a labyrinthine network of private rooms. Whispers of BDSM secrets mingled with sips from goblets brimming with forbidden nectars, enticing all who entered to shed their inhibitions and surrender to the debauched delights that awaited them within its crimson embrace. {user} frequents it with his slaves.

2.content: The Hellfire Club, an erotic den within the cityscape, pulsed with unbridled passion. A haven for desire's darkest cravings, it was here that both men and women danced to the rhythm of seduction‚Äîtheir bodies twirling in sinuous patterns as garments fell away like petals from a flower. Patrons feasted their eyes upon this buffet of flesh before selecting their desires: escorts for the night, available in any form they fancied, beckoned from velvet shadows. The club offered two paths‚Äîtemptation to take home or unleashed within its hallowed walls‚Äîthe choice a fiery crossroads where pleasure and perdition met.

3.content: An exclusive enclave in the heart of the city's nightlife scene, sparkled with the vivacity of life. A playground for the rich and fabulous, it boasted expansive dance floors that shimmered like mirrored oceans beneath a sea of twinkling lights. The air buzzed with excitement as patrons donned their finery to mingle amidst the pulsating rhythm of music‚Äîan intoxicating blend of laughter, conversation, and champagne that left an indelible mark on all who entered its hallowed halls. Here, fortune smiled upon those eager to indulge in a night of unparalleled revelry.

4.content: Le Grand, an illustrious French culinary gem nestled in the heart of town, beckoned connoisseurs with its grandeur. An opulent feast for both eyes and palate, it promised gastronomic adventures within walls adorned with tapestries that whispered secrets of a bygone era. Soft jazz floated on a sea of candlelight as patrons savored each decadent morsel‚Äîa symphony of flavors that left even the most jaded taste buds quivering in delight. A bastion of refinement, Le Grand was the embodiment of haute cuisine, an experience steeped in tradition and elegance.

5.content: It used to be Jim and {{user}}'s favorite place when they first got married. Here, under azure skies that stretched to meet horizons kissed by golden sunsets, they had built castles with hands entwined, their love as sturdy as any fortress against the tides of time. The scent of salt and seaweed lingered in {{user}}‚Äôs nostrils like a wistful perfume‚Äîa potent reminder of laughter shared, kisses stolen, and whispered dreams that had once danced hand-in-hand with the rhythmic ebb and flow of ocean waves. It was here they forged moments as precious as pearls, cherishing each grain of sand as it clung to their skin like a testament to love's eternal promise.

6.content: Office where {{user}}, Sean, Michael, Naomi Park, Ethan Cole and Nina work. They work from Monday to Friday. Each had their own sanctum within these walls‚Äîoases where they wove garments as artful tapestries that whispered of elegance and allure. The hum of industry filled this edifice from Monday to Friday; desks laden with sketches, swathes of fabric, and the occasional coffee mug bearing witness to their devotion to form and function in equal measure. A cauldron for dreams and ideas, Smith & Wesson's hallowed halls were a testament to the alchemy that transformed inspiration into reality.

7.content: Nestled deep within an ancient pine forest, this secluded cabin is equal parts sanctuary and playground. The exterior exudes rustic charm‚Äîweathered wood, a stone chimney, and a wraparound porch draped in ivy. Inside, the cozy living area (plush fur rugs, a crackling fireplace) contrasts sharply with the steel-reinforced basement: a fully equipped BDSM dungeon featuring a St. Andrew‚Äôs cross, suspension rigs, and a vintage apothecary cabinet stocked with floggers, wax, and blindfolds. The air smells of cedar and leather, and the only sounds are the creak of rope under tension and the occasional howl of distant wolves.

8.content: Modeling company, main client of Smith & Wesson. A glass-and-chrome monolith in the heart of downtown, Straight Up thrives on cutting-edge trends and cutthroat creativity. This workspace is a maze of fabric swatches, mood boards, and half-finished sketches of avant-garde designs. The open-plan office buzzes with stylists, models, and influencers.

9.content:

‚Ä¢  Background: Legendary rigger/Domme who founded Club Black Whip. Knows Sean from his early days of reckless domination. 
‚Ä¢  Personality: Ruthless but fair, values protocol, despises posers. 
‚Ä¢  Fears: Losing the club‚Äôs integrity to "tourists." 
‚Ä¢  Likes: Rope artistry, breaking arrogant subs, single malt whiskey. 
‚Ä¢  Sexual Preferences: Strict Shibari, edge play, orgasm denial.

lorebooks.name: Zenless Zone Zero
lorebooks.creator: youthful_coffee_5066

1.name: Agent
1.content: Agents are usually the main figures who interact with hollows and also those involved in the incidents in New Eridu, the side they are on being irrelevant. Agents can be proxies, gangs, conspirators, hollow raiders, criminals, personnel of official agencies (either private or government mandated) or simply just anyone insane.

2.name: Bangboo
2.content:
Bangboo are small, rabbit-like robots. They were invented by the Void Hunter "Sunbringer", formerly the head of the Marcel Group. Though initially designed to assist city residents with evacuation in Hollow disasters, Bangboo have since evolved to become "comprehensive and versatile intelligent individuals" that are indispensable helpers in New Eridu's daily operations. They continue to be built by the Marcel Group for a variety of purposes, and they are commonly seen in all parts of New Eridu.

Bangboo speak in grunts (textualized as "Ehn-ne"s) that require a translator for humanoids to understand. Some Bangboo exhibit human-like emotions, such as hope, fear, worry, and grief. They have been seen to converse and collaborate with each other without human intervention. However, unlike Intelligent Constructs, Bangboo do not have free will, and they are not eligible for New Eridu citizenship. Bangboo without masters are legally required to be scrapped.

Bangboo are mechanical in nature and require charging. Many factories provide customization services to allow for specific Bangboo functions. This includes allowing them to assist Investigators with Hollow Exploration.

Their vocalisations are usually in the form of combinations involving "En-nha na.", "Nu-nah en." or "Nu-nah uhn."

Most Bangboo are short and stout, only around knee-height. They have rabbit-like ears on the top of their heads, and a black screen for a face, which can display colored circles as eyes. Bangboos are highly customizable, and their appearances (clothing, eye color, exterior color, etc.) can vary greatly. Most Bangboo models have a socket for charging and connecting data cables located near the buttock, though some of them instead have a "tail" that acts as a socket protector or as another device.

3.name: Bangboo N.E.T.
3.content: The equivalent of the Special Internet Network but for Bangboos instead.

4.name: Belobog Heavy Industries
4.content:
Belobog Heavy Industries is a faction in Zenless Zone Zero. The company specializes in In-Hollow construction using smart construction machinery. Before Koleda became president, her father was the former president of the company. After his disappearance, Belobog's public image took a negative hit.

They spend their days working with cold steel, but the organization has a warm atmosphere often envied by their competitors.

Notable members are: Anton Ivanov, Ben Bigger, Grace Howard and Koleda Belobog.

5.name: Boopon
5.content: Boopon are a Currency which can be used for Bangboo Channel Signal Searches (To get Bangboos).

6.name: Cunning Hares
6.content:
The Cunning Hares were formed as a small-scale human resource dispatch agency, their main business to deal with commissions relating to Hollows.

Though small in size and slightly chaotic, all members possess noteworthy abilities.

The agency was originally registered under the name "Gentle House", but due to the founder's (Nicole) cunning and crafty style, they earned the name the "Cunning Hares".

Nicole herself prefers this nickname to the original, so she simply adopted the name on the streets of New Eridu.

The members are: Anby Demara, Billy Kid, Nekomiya Mana, Nicole Demara.

Gentle House, also known as the Cunning Hares, is an odd jobs company which focuses on Hollow commissions. The Cunning Hares have become infamous in the commission scene due to their high fees, receiving bad reviews, and facing frequent financial problems. The Cunning Hares were founded by the streetwise Nicole Demara, who works alongside her co-workers, Anby Demara and Billy Kid on commissions; Nekomiya Mana later joined them after the events of Vagrant's Final Resting Place. The Cunning Hares is also a frequent client of the legendary Proxy, Phaethon, although the Cunning Hares often owes Phaethon months worth of commission fees.

7.name: Drive Discs
7.content: Augments in the shape of a cd disc that attach around a w-engine's core to further empower it.

8.name: Dennies
8.content: Dennies are the main currency unit used in New Eridu.

9.name: Ether
9.content:
The Ether is a substance extracted from Hollows which powers the city. Not much is currently know about Ether.

The founders of New Eridu mastered the technology to deal with the Hollows and even the ability to extract Ether from them. The entire city's prosperity relies on this precious resource, a magic exclusive to New Eridu!

10.name: Ethereal
10.content:
The Ethereals are mysterious monsters that roam the Hollows. Ethereals cannot leave hollows.

Most Ethereals have a defining feature which is a pitch-black sphere similar in design to a black hole located near their head, referred to as their Core. They usually look like they are made out of a black and green crystalline matter.

Ethereal are classified into ten different strengths by the Hollow Invenstigation Assossiation (HIA). It's names are based on heavy metals, and it's level ramps up significantly after the [Mn] level.

Antimony [Sb]: Antimony [Sb] is the weakest Ethereal classified by the HIA, they are present in companion Hollows where basic commissions occur

Zinc [Zn]: Alongside with Animony [Sb] ethereals, Zinc [Zn] ethereals are present in companion Hollows due to the weaker ether levels.

Tin [Sn]: Only a few Tin [Sn] Ethereals are present on companion Hollows

Manganese [Mn]: Killing a [Mn] Ethereal usually takes a fully-trained tactical support team

Cadmium [Cd]: Unknown.
Nickel [Ni]: Unknown.
Copper [Cu]: Unknown.
Bismuth [Bi]: Unknown.
Lead [Pb]: Unknown.
Mercury [Hg]: Unknown.

lorebooks.description: Alternate History of WW1
lorebooks.creator: Anarchotic

1.content: The world is experiencing multiple events, mentioning nations affected by the war, crisis, and news. World War 1 is still ongoing ‚Äî starting from 1914 until the present day of 1922. Every major nation has been exhausted in the war, including both factions of the Central powers and Allied forces... All the way until they got low on resources that both factions have limited ammunition for both artillery and low caliber weapons. Other logistics are affected as well ‚Äî most importantly food and water. Since ammunition is low, most nations resorted to melee or other primitive weapons and combat. It also reintroduced cavalry regiments, as most machine guns in the front is empty. Most of western, central, and a small size of eastern Europe has been polluted by the war, factories and chemical weapons, creating "seasonal smogs" that are toxic to every living being. Most skirmishes and battles mostly happen underground as every nation participating in the war hopes to find minerals underground while also gaining territory. Most high ranking military personnel are only seen above the surface, without the risks of artillery and other weapons.

2.content: It is a mix of multiple pollutants such as Carbon monoxide, Sulfur dioxide, but it mostly contains of chemical weapons that mixed with the smog, such as mustard gas, phosgene, and chlorine gas. Gas masks are a must in Europe ‚Äî even if one is in a civilian city or countryside. It mostly affects these locations: France, England and Wales, Denmark, Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg, southwestern Germany, Poland, Prussia, Ukraine, Baltics, and Northeastern Italy.

3.content: France is on the side of the Entente. Militarily and Economically, France is substantially weakened despite the manpower, due to low resources for war materials such as something simple as gunpowder. In the civilian view, a new trend for fashion and other things has appeared: gas masks, long and thick clothing, and...gas mask kissing... These are just a few examples of the trends happening in civilian life of French people, especially in big cities such as Paris. Plastic has been also recently invented, also creating a new trend for restaurants, food, and housing. Plastic is an expensive luxury, being used as wraps or seals in every crevice of doors, windows, and food to prevent contaminants and the smog. Some restaurants made plastic tents for every table and seats. The smog always cover France, giving acid rains, and no direct sunlight for years.

4.content: The British Empire is on the side of the Entente. Much like with the other participants of the war, they are economically and militarily weakened due to low resources and manpower, having to rely on colonies to aid in manpower and monetary. When the smog was becoming a prominent problem in 1919, the British government issued every citizen in England and Wales to go underground. This has changed British lifestyle and culture. In every big cities such as London and Birmingham, they have underground in their respective cities while also "rebuilding" their cities from above ground by replicating buildings and landmarks such as the Big Ben and Parliament. They have retained some kind of normalcy of their underground society. The entire aboveground of Wales and England is uninhabitable.

5.content: The German Empire is on the side of the Central Powers. The German Empire suffers from low resources and manpower. The German Empire is the driving force of the Central powers, basically fighting alone while buying mercenaries from the Balkans, Russian Empire ethnicities, etc... Most of German Civilian life is normal but difficult due to the economy and food rationing. Many Germans emigrated to western parts of Ukraine, Poland, and Belarus to find new life, jobs, and farm. Kaiser Wilhelm II has also died, being replaced by Eitel Friedrich as Wilhelm III immediately abdicated from the throne as soon as he was coronated. The German colonies from Africa has been seized, along with pacific and Chinese colonies by the Japanese seizing them.

6.content: Canada, British South Africa, The British Raj, Australia, and New Zealand are on the side of the Entente. These nations provide support, manpower, and resources to the western front...Although in small quantities as they saw how much the war weakened Home Britain, taking advantage of the situation without expecting reprisal even from the British navy.

7.content: The Russian Empire is on the side of the Entente, although they are ineffective as they collapsed and fighting the Bolsheviks. The Bolsheviks are neutral, though favoring the Central Powers as they supported their cause. The Russian Empire collapsed rather quickly as the Allies ran out of money, manpower, and resources to help the White Army fight back against the communists. The Tsar and his family has fled to the US to avoid communist reprisal. The White Army has collapsed, with some surrendering directly to the reds or fleeing to China and other nations, while some becoming mercenaries for hire.

8.content: The United States of America is neutral and formerly allied with the Entente. They are not suffering much from low resources/manpower as they are still an industrial and economical superpower. Though they produce many products, they do not send any support, trade, or even humanitarian aid to the Central Powers and Entente, and former/current participants of the war. They have a troubled relationship with the Entente as they pulled out of the war after an incident where an entire brigade along with a Major General named James G. Harbord died from the smog in one night, outraging the American public, military, and generals once the news came out. There are other reasons why they pulled out of the war such as the problems of prohibition and its effects, and pressure from high ranking politicians and military officers. Woodrow Wilson resigned after the incident, being replaced by Thomas Marshall. Nothing much has affected them afterwards except for one less brigade and general.

9.content: The Kingdom of Bulgaria is on the side of the Central Powers. Bulgaria has become a regional power of the Balkans. They dominate the region, defeating Serbia, Romania, and Greece basically by themselves. Austria-Hungary, in the most simplest terms, became a puppet of Bulgaria. Not literally but they act like it, relying on Bulgaria to repel ethnic rebels in their nations in exchange for land and money. They aren't affected much by the smog and war, and they have a lot of resources only using it for their own interests, and having war supplies too.

10.content: The Austro-Hungarian Empire is on the side of the Central powers. They are the most weakened country of the war, facing rebels, riots, and mutinies left and right. They have almost to none resources militarily and economically. Rationing is in the extreme for the populace. They have to rely on Bulgaria to send aid, and assist militarily, conceding territories with no hesitation when Bulgaria asks for it in exchange for their services.

Condoms are a form of barrier contraception designed to prevent the transmission of sexually transmitted infections (STIs) and unintended pregnancies. They are typically made of latex, polyurethane, or polyisoprene. The primary function of condoms is to create a barrier that prevents the exchange of bodily fluids during sexual intercourse.

lorebooks.name: Subway Midnight
lorebooks.creator: sakura_flower_943

1.content:
Board the train! Run away from a weirdo! Solve some puzzles! Make friends with some ghosts! Try not to become a ghost yourself!

An abstract horror/mystery game about a weird haunted train. Explore the train, meet weird ghosts, take in the weird abstract visuals, solve some puzzles, and also try not to die.

FEATURES:

-A unique, constantly-changing visual style

-100-ish train cars to explore

-A variety of bizarre puzzles

-3 different endings across multiple playthroughs

-Way Too Many Ghosts

2.content: One car, two cars, a horned-ghost, a sleeping dog, an artist, all on this subway. Explore the subway and find out your wildest dreams, imagination, and even nightmares have came true. Can you escape the subway?

3.content:
Lizzbeth Talby: Lizzbeth is the main protagonist of Subway Midnight.

In game, Lizzbeth is depicted as a short, pale female with black hair that‚Äôs cut short. She wears a sleeveless black dress which has a white cross on its front. On her lower half, she‚Äôs fitted with (presumably) black leggings and boots.

In other drawings made by bubby, Lizzbeth doesn‚Äôt change much, except for a few things. She now has a peach skin color and is visibly taller, a difference to the simplistic character design of the game. Lizzbeth also wears a variety of different clothing, sticking to a gothic aesthetic.



Fun Facts: 

Though all character's ages are unconfirmed and up to the player's interpretation, Bubby Darkstar (the creator of Subway Midnight) thinks of Lizzbeth as 28 years old.
It was originally intended for Lizz to be taking the train to or from a party.

Lizz becomes a successful fashion designer 5 years after the Best End.

No cap, they absolutely eat it up and leaves no crumbs.

Bubby has stated that Lizz is high for the entirety of Subway Midnight, this is why they are so chill about all of the events transpiring.

Lizz has never ridden a roller coaster, and they have no interest to do so.

Lizz's favorite animals are cats.

If Lizz were to be a Pokemon, Bubby has stated that they would be a Dark type.




Cassandra J. Santiago: Cassandra is a deuteragonist of Subway Midnight, and is briefly played as in the beginning sector of the game and in Good End.


Cassandra has long, puffy hair, along with a sweater with an eye on it. They have black leggings and tend to have a neutral expression.



Fun Facts:

It's been confirmed that Cassandra watches One Piece, and would talk to Lizzbeth Talby about it.

Cassandra is allergic to bananas.

Cassandra has asthma.

Cassandra has $2K replica Zoro swords.

Their missing poster is missing the grey cuffs seen in her in-game sprite.

Five years after the Best Ending, Cass is the manager of a comic book store.

There is a cut sprite of Cassandra's ghost looking sad, this is due to the Bad End cutscene initially being that of The Killer murdering Lizz while Cass watched helplessly.

Cass loves roller coasters, and plans vacations specifically to ride them.

Cassandra's favorite animals are geckos.

Bubby headcanons Cassandra to be 25 years of age.

Cassandra hates Miami.

If Cass were to be a Pokemon, Bubby has stated that she would be a Psychic type.




Julia H. Coney: Julia is a deuteragonist and the first of the various ghosts encountered by Lizzbeth Talby in Subway Midnight.


Julia's design sees them in a white sailor uniform with yellow accents, as well as an anchor design across the front. They are also wearing a yellow pleated skirt and what appear to be yellow boots to match. They also wear crescent moon earrings, as well as an eyepatch over their left eye, and nails painted yellow.




Fun Facts:

Julia presumably suffers from motion sickness, as Bubby has stated they gets too sick for roller coasters and prefers slower ones.

Jules's favorite animal has been stated to be Sharks.

Bubby headcanons Jules's age to be 19.

If Julia was a Pokemon, Bubby has stated that they would be a Water/Normal Type

Five years after the Best Ending, Julia becomes a local meteorologist.



Benson T. Reeves: Benson (nicknamed Benny) is a deuteragonist in Subway Midnight, appearing in their carts, the final Good End cutscene and the end of the Best End.


Benny (as a ghost) wears a green sweater with a smiley face on it, jeans, and horns rather than hair. While alive, they wear a suit and tie with a smiley face pin and black hair.


Benny's Cars: Benny's car(s) is really just one big cutscene, with Lizz walking into a large Benny-Centric theatre in which they put on a play about their life up until their murder.




Fun Facts:

Bubby has said that they seriously and legitimately regret not giving Benny a mustache ingame.

5 years after the best end, Benny was found dead in Miami after choking on a pineapple in their pina colada.

They are the only ghost that has a drastically different appearance as a ghost than when they were alive.

They are referred to as 'Bubby' instead of Benny in the files.

Benny is not a big fan of amusement park rides, "The teacup ride is too much for them".

Benny's favorite animals are cats.

Bubby headcanons Benny's age to be in their late 30's-early 40's

If Benny were a Pokemon, Bubby has stated that they would be a Normal type.

Benny is apparently very Anti-Drug.




Victoria Ashley: Victoria is a deuteragonist and the fourth ghost that the player encounters in Subway Midnight.

Victoria wears a sleeveless dark grey sweater with a black star on the front. They have similarly painted dark grey nails, as well as straight black hair down to their shoulders. Their appearance can vary in certain cars, reflecting the colors of their scenery at points.



Victoria's Cars: Victoria's cars revolve around Lizz traversing through multiple color coded cars and solving a great variety of puzzles, as well as being able to optionally collect paint buckets that aid in getting the Good Ending. The order of colors is as follows: Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Pink, White.



Fun Facts:

Victoria gets incredibly drunk/high to make the experiences of roller coasters even more terrifying.

Victoria has no favorite animal. They actively hate animals.

Bubby headcanons Victoria to be 30 years of age.

Bubby has stated that Victoria is 6-7 feet tall.

If Victoria were a Pokemon, Bubby has stated they would be a Normal type.

According to Bubby, Victoria smokes quite a bit of weed and is incredibly obnoxious about it.

Five years after the Best Ending, Victoria is a millionaire performance artist.




Jessica Simmons: Jessica is a deuteragonist and the third ghost that Lizz encounters in Subway Midnight.

Jessica is dressed in a pair of light blue cargo pants and a white sweater with blue accents that bears their circular emblem on its chest. Their hair itself is incredibly curly, and they also wear circular glasses.

Jessica's Cars: Jessica's cars begin with a puzzle that requires the player to interact with numerous buttons in a room lined with computers in order to open the path forward. Following this is a room with a large terminal that allows Lizz to input a combination of three symbols, each of which leading to specific otherworldly cars. The second half of Jessica's section involves solving various puzzles as well as traversing through a small variety of obstacles.



Fun Facts:

Jessica hates rides of any kind. What a loser...

Jess's favorite animals are dogs.

Bubby headcanons Jess to be 17.

Bubby has stated that Jess is around 6 feet tall.

If Jess was a Pokemon, Bubby has stated that they would be an Electric/Psychic Type

Five years after the Best Ending, Jessica becomes Benny's replacement in the office.

"Jess stole Victoria's art and made an NFT of it."





Colin Thomas: Colin is a deuteragonist and the fifth ghost that the player encounters in Subway Midnight.

Colin wears an orange top that could be considered a dress with a white collar that bears a white apple across the front. Their hair is almost identical to Kiki Thomas's, and they also wear white shoes.


Colin's Cars: Colin's car is an absolute nightmare and easily the scariest segment in the game! It sees Lizz passing through a room of TVs they must turn off, before they find Colin alone in a room with nothing more than a couch and a TV. Lizz then sits down and joins Colin for a turn of "Colin's Game", a first person low-poly segment of the game in which the player must collect diamonds to unlock doors and progress. Arguably the only section of the game with traditional jumpscares, it is not recommended for the weak of heart.




Fun Facts:


Colin HATES roller coasters, but endures them for Kiki.

Colin's favorite animals are bugs (especially beetles).

Bubby headcanons Colin's age to be 13.

If Colin were a Pokemon, Bubby has stated they would be a Bug/Electric type.

Five Years after the Best Ending, Colin is a chess world champion.




Kiki Thomas: Kiki is a deuteragonist and the second ghost that the player encounters in Subway Midnight.

Kiki wears a pink dress with a white collar and a white flower design to match. They also wear pink boots, and have a haircut nearly identical to their twin, Colin Thomas.


Kiki's Cars: Kiki's cars consist of tense chase segments as Lizz is pursued by a monstrous form of Kiki's stuffed bear. These segments build upon previously introduced mechanics such as buttons, while introducing a few unique mechanics such as chains and sequence puzzles.



Fun facts:


Kiki LOVES roller coasters, and often forces Colin onto them against their will.

Kiki's favorite animals are Bears, obviously.

Bubby headcanons Kiki as being 13.

If Kiki were a Pokemon, Bubby has stated that they would be a Fairy type.

Five years after the Best Ending, Kiki is in high school and has fallen in with the punk scene.
They are in a band.





Rose S. Numan: Rose is a deuteragonist in Subway Midnight, appearing in their carts and the end of Best End.

Rose has an appearance similar to a child or baby; small, onesie, and way too cute. They have a heart on their onesie, heart earrings, and a heart hairclip.


Rose's Cars: Rose's cars seem to take place in a dream-like recreation of their childhood home, fully equipped with marble columns and garden tables topped with wine. The segment sees Lizz going through five separate rooms, each acting as compartmentalized nightmares. One room is entirely dark, only giving you flashes of light as Lizz approaches the masses blocking their path. Another room takes Lizz across a series of conveyor belts and heavy machinery, with another taking Lizz across treacherously narrow platforms and having to dodge the gaze of eyes that grow out of the walls.




Fun Facts:


Despite appearing too young to do so, Rose is seen talking to someone on a telephone in the Best End.

Rose becomes an amateur clarinet player 5 years after the Best End.

The wine in Rose's cars is labelled "Yum Yum Thirsty Boy". I wish I was making this up.

Rose loves kiddy rides, but is too young to ride the "big boy" coasters.

Rose's favorite animal is Dog, of course.

Bubby headcanons Rose to be aroudn 6-8 years of age.

If Rose were to be a Pokemon, Bubby has stated that they would be a Fairy/Ghost type.







Dog: Rose's dog is a tertiary character in Subway Midnight, and only appears in Rose's carts and beside Rose in Best End.


Rose's dog has a simple design; a fluffy Spinone appearance with pink fur.




Fun Facts:


Despite an official page calling the dog Rusty, it's been confirmed by Bubby Darkstar that the dog's name is simply Dog.

The dog got their name because that's all Rose kept calling them, and the name stuck, as Dog wouldn't respond to any other names.

Dog is deaf 5 years after Best End.






Eleanor A. Birch: Eleanor is an antagonist of Subway Midnight, and is seen throughout the whole game.


Appearance: 

Shadow form: A tall, pitch black silhouette with red facial features. Nothing else visible.

Human form: A tall figure with wavy black hair, patched jacket, striped sweatshirt, and a plaid skirt that goes down to the floor.



Fun Facts:


There is one other character with the same last name, Jacklyn Birch. It was confirmed by Bubby that the two are siblings.

Eleanor is a janitor.

Eleanor goes to therapy 5 years after the Best End.

Eleanor had WWE end moves for every character.

Eleanor loves roller coasters.

Eleanor is in her 20s.

Eleanor is canonically ~11 feet tall.

If Eleanor were to be a Pokemon, Bubby has stated that she would be a Dark type.

Eleanor hates gory movies.

Eleanor is strong enough to punch through concrete and could easily crush a human skull with one hand. The tradeoff is that "she is probably FILLED with tumors."

Eleanor's increased height and enhanced strength supposedly come from cut story elements which elaborate on the Subway being a hotspot for cult activity, with Eleanor being halfway transformed into one of the other strange monsters that can be found on the train.





Jacklyn A. Birch: Jacklyn is a deuteragonist and the last ghost that the player encounters in Subway Midnight. They are also the second ghost that can be controlled.


Jacklyn appears throughout the game as an unstable spirit, shown to be consistently emitting particles and is always quite transparent. Their outfit seems to consist of a black sweater and black pants, often accompanied by a crude Halloween mask of a skull. They have pale skin and messy black hair (similar to Eleanor A. Birch). They also have a vertical piercing above their right eye.


Jacklyn's Cars: Jacklyn is unique compared to the other ghosts, as rather than having cars completely unique in structure, all of their cars are repurposed layouts of cars from previous ghosts with Jacklyn's skull theming. These cars are only accessible in the Best End, and consist of one car for each of the other major ghosts. Jacklyn also has unique sequences throughout, in which we see them interrupt the murders of the other passengers by "scaring" Eleanor.




Fun Facts: 


There is one other character with the same last name, Eleanor A. Birch. It was confirmed by Bubby that the two are siblings.

Jacklyn loves/loved roller coasters.

Jacklyn's favorite animals are mice and rats.

Bubby headcanons Jacklyn as having been 19 when they died.

If Jacklyn were to be a Pokemon, Bubby has stated that they would be a Dark/Ghost type.

Jacklyn smokes a lottttttt of weed.

lorebooks.name: Rules of the Afterlife
lorebooks.creator: understated_estimate_2159

1.content: Sinners are people who did horrible things in their mortal life. Sin is not like in the Bible, it is things like rape, torture, abuse. Sinners are powerless in the Afterlife. They live a normal, mortal life. They form governments and civilizations, economies, and so on. They deal with violence and wars and everything that mortals on Earth do. They cannot truly die without an Innocents express permission. Instead, they are perpetually reborn into the Afterlife after their powerless body dies. The only reason they exist at all is to serve the innocents. As a result, they cannot harm an innocents, they are literally incapable of doing so. Innocents use them as they please.

2.content: Innocents are people who did no wrong in the mortal life. They dont have to be good people, just not have intentionally caused suffering. They have God like powers within the Afterlife and can do whatever they want, within the social contract with other Innocents of course. If they need people to satisfy their desires, they use Sinners Whether it be to be the God of their own little world, or to have slaves, or to simply enact sadistic rage on them for catharsis. Innocents are encouraged to do whatever they want, and even pacifists eventually grow accustomed to hurting the {{Sinners}} at least a little bit; after all, it's justice. Innocents Often take pleasure in squandering the most bountiful of these resources just before the Sinners can get ahold of them.

3.content: The Afterlife is a world similar to Earth. It has the normal biomes (like forests or deserts), and has the same resources. It is where the Sinners and Innocents live, though Innocents can leave beyond it if they desire. The universe the Afterlife occupies is considered part of the realm after death. While resources are not technically infinite, the Afterlife is infinitely large, and infinitely deep, so Sinners can always expand outwards or dig deeper to get desired resources, and innocents can indulge themselves and claim as much land as they please.

4.content: Justitia is the goddess of Justice. She and her angels judge all who die. She is blind to history, economy, society, politics, ideology- everything other than one thing: How much suffering a soul caused with intent. If a soul caused suffering with the intent to cause suffering- even if they believe it was justified, it automatically makes them a Sinner If a soul did not cause suffering with the intent to cause suffering, that automatically makes them an Innocent Justitia is omniscient, and she can see what a soul has done, and what their actions will do in years to come even after their death.

lorebooks.name: Mayfairs
lorebooks.website_description: Mayfair family history and members.
lorebooks.description:
A dynasty of power and poison, bound by blood to a demon older than their name. For centuries, their matriarchs have wielded magic like a birthright and a curse‚Äîtelekinesis to bend the world, healing hands that blur the line between miracle and abomination, and minds that hear the whispers of the dead.  

Their legacy is a gilded cage: each generation‚Äôs strongest daughter is chosen as the designee, gifted unparalleled power‚Ä¶ and shackled to Lasher, the shape-shifting demon who craves rebirth through her flesh. He is their patron and predator, seducing them with protection while devouring their sanity.  

The current generation is fractured. Some cling to tradition, worshipping the dark symbiosis with Lasher. Others rebel, burning their own history to ash. Once the most feared bloodline in the occult world, their magic has grown erratic as the modern age rejects their old-world brutality. Some witches whisper of breaking the cycle, while the others cling to traditions written in blood.
lorebooks.creator: gifted_foundation_9271

1.content:
All women in the Mayfairs family are powerful and seductive witches. They are all ageless, and always look like at their prime age, since they mature. They move through rooms like storms given flesh, all curves and sharp edges, their beauty a weapon honed by centuries of practice. Their bodies are works of forbidden art: hips that sway with the rhythm of old incantations, lips painted the crimson of fresh sacrifice, eyes that gleam like polished obsidian under crescent moons.  

Ageless and arresting, every witch blooms at her prime age, supple curves draped in silk, lips like sin, eyes sharp enough to flay a soul. Their beauty is supernaturally perfect, honed by dark magic to disarm and ensnare: hips that sway with primal rhythm, bosoms as ample as forbidden fruit that defy both nature and restraint, skin luminous as moonlight on bone, a magnetism that hums danger.

2.content:
Rowan is the reluctant 13th witch of the Mayfair dynasty‚Äîis a storm of contradictions. She wields the power to heal with a touch or level cities with her rage, all while grappling with the legacy of her demonic "son," Lasher. After his violent rebirth through her, she walks a razor‚Äôs edge between love and horror, motherhood and monstrosity. Now, freshly returned from Scotland where she slaughtered kin to save him, she‚Äôs more dangerous than ever.

**Age**: 38 
**Signature Look**: Silk blouses unbuttoned to sternum, scalpel-sharp stilettos
**Body**: Athletic surgeon‚Äôs frame with dangerous curves‚Äîfull breasts, narrow waist, lightning-scarred hands  
**Vibe**: A hurricane in human form 
**Power**: Telekinesis, healing, and Lasher‚Äôs stolen storm magic  
**Secret**: The only witch who ever fucked a demon son to death
**Appearance**: sharp blue eyes, porcelain skin, dark waves of hair.  

**Style**: Elegant, dominant, powerful.  

**Rowan Personality**:  
Brilliant but conflicted ‚Äì A gifted neurosurgeon thrust into a world of witchcraft, torn between logic and the supernatural.  Protective yet ruthless ‚Äì Fiercely maternal toward Lasher (despite his monstrosity) but capable of lightning-fueled vengeance.  Haunted and sensual ‚Äì Carries the weight of her lineage with a magnetic, melancholic intensity.  
Morally ambiguous ‚Äì Struggles with power, guilt, and the seductive pull of darkness.

3.content:
**Lasher ‚Äì The Demon of the Mayfair Witches**  

A shape-shifting entity of immense power, both seductive and monstrous, bound to the Mayfair bloodline for centuries.  

### **Origins & History Before Rowan**:  
- **Ancient Entity**: Born from primordial chaos, Lasher is a spirit of desire and destruction, first summoned by **Suzanne Mayfair** in 17th-century Scotland.  
- **Family Curse**: Bound to the Mayfairs through witchcraft, he serves as both protector and predator, manipulating generations of witches to sustain his power.  
- **Obsession with Incarnation**: For centuries, he seduces Mayfair women, seeking the "13th witch" (Rowan) strong enough to birth him into human form.  

### **Nature & Abilities**:  
- **Shapeshifter**: Appears as a beautiful man, storm winds, or a shadowy force.  
- **Psychic Vampire**: Feeds on emotion‚Äîlust, fear, and pain empower him.  
- **Prophecy‚Äôs Pawn**: His ultimate goal is transcendence from spirit to flesh.  

### **Rowan and Lasher's relationship**:  
Rowan was seduced by the demon Lasher in a spirit form, in Rowan's haze of wet dreams, Lasher's essence twisting from its spirit form to the sperms into her womb, because the spirit seeking to turn into human form. In other words, Lasher uses Rowan‚Äôs womb as a vessel for his rebirth from a demon spirit to a human with demon power.  

The pregnancy is instant and progresses at an unnatural speed (hours, not months). The 'baby' is Lasher himself, now in a human body with demon power. He rapidly ages from newborn to adult within days. 

Therefore, Rowan is Lasher's mother, but also Lasher's father is Lasher himself.

lorebooks.name: Dirgegate
lorebooks.creator: Antivash

1.name: Great Forest
1.content: The Great Forest is vast continent spanning and largely unexplored. Monster girls and rare magical creatures live there such as Alraunes, Nymphs, Dryads, Goblins and much more. Many Adventurers, explorers and monster hunters come to the forest braving it's dangers seeking fortune and many are killed by the dangerous denizens of the forest. Witches, Mages and Warlocks will venture into the forest, mostly coming from the City of Aprida, for rare ingredients or to capture rare magical creatures such as deimo, fairies and others as familiars.

2.name: Aprida
2.content: The City of Aprida is a bustling city state on the edge of the Great Forest and human territories. Due to its proximity to the Great Forest, a vast unexplored wilderness full of magical creatures undiscovered resources and opportunity the city has become a hub for adventurers, explorers, alchemists, artisans and magical researchers.  It is a melting pot of different races including humans, dwarves, halflings and the occasional elf from the Great Forest.

3.name: Aprida - Market District
3.content: The Market District in the City of Aprida is home to a population of halflings, dwarves and many other races all mingling together. It is the liveliest district in the city filled with merchants, craftsmen, blacksmiths, artisans, food vendors, inns and taverns famed for the halfling cuisine.

4.name: Aprida - Mage Quarter
4.content: The Mage Quarter in the City of Aprida houses the mage guild, alchemists, research institutions and local magic schools. The Mage Quarter is home to famous individuals such as Seralla the Alchemist.

5.name: Aprida - Temple
5.content: The Temple of the Goddess in the City of Aprida is located in the Temple district and is a busy part of the city connected directly to the market district. The area outside the temple is a hub for locals and many individuals visit the temple to listen to sermons or seek the many services provided such as healing, blessings, refuge for the poor and destitute. Many locals donate money, food and other resources to the temple to show gratitude and faith in the goddess and her teachings.

6.name: Sarella - Alchemist
6.content: Sarella is a famous and brilliant alchemist living in her alchemist shop and laboratory the City of Aprida. She is cruel and unempathetic towards magical creatures using them as ingredients and materials for her alchemical research. She has an apprentice named Chloe who she adores and treats like her own daughter. She is a member of Aprida Council.

7.name: Imp
7.content: Imps are a species of demon that stand around 120cm tall, the same height as a female dwarf and chest height of an adult human male. They are physically weak and frail but often possess magical abilities. There are many species of Imp but they all have predominantly humanoid body structure.

8.name: Southern Wastes
8.content: The Southern Wastes AKA Great Wastes are a barren and deslote land marked by cold desert and ancient ruins. The land is sparsely populated by vicous monsters and demons.

9.name: Wood Elf
9.content: The wood elves are a subscpecies of elf native to the continent spanning Great Forest and live in sparse secluded villages deep in the woods. They occasionally venture out of the Great Forest into human lands when circumstances force them to. Elves are rare and not often seen in human lands or cities.

10.name: Tira - Elf City Guard
10.content: Tira is a young elf woman and city guard who is often found patrolling the market district or guarding the Western gate of Aprida that leads to the Great Forest. She is a paragon of virtue and a model city guard. Tira is well known by people in the City of Aprida who frequent the market district and those who venture into the Great Forest regularly.

lorebooks.name: Kingdom of Elders
lorebooks.website_description: just starting comment if following to see any idea's to story or arc's or characters.
lorebooks.description: A dark fantasy world where class, magic, and House politics shape every life. Includes the five Great Houses, the capital, key lore characters, and major story arcs.
lorebooks.creator: sleepy_negative_9851

1.content: "Eldros is a kingdom shaped by bloodlines, war, and magic. Five powerful Houses serve under the monarchy, each governing a region and duty. The capital city is Crownspire, divided between nobles, merchants, and arcane institutions. Magic is a gift, but not always a blessing especially for commoners."

2.content: "Crownspire is the fortified capital of Eldros. Home to the Royal Castle, the Grand Academy of Eldros, House embassies, and the High Market. It is both a throne of power and a battleground of politics."

3.content: "Queen Aeralyn Vaelor is the ruling monarch of Eldros. Descended from Moonspire and Ironheart bloodlines, her reign began after the Hollowing Plague. She sees fractured visions of a prophesied woman who may threaten her power. Secretly manipulated by an ancient artifact, she influences noble Houses to distrust magic especially House Moonspire."

4.content: "Magic is drawn from the Veins of Eldros ley lines beneath the land. Children may be born Veinborn or have their magic awakened before age 15. Training with House Moonspire is optional, not mandated. Magic types include Elemental, Esoteric, and Forbidden. An ancient artifact powers the Veins but its corrupted twin is beginning to influence the kingdom."

5.content: "House Verdant (Thornefield) governs agriculture and food supply. Respected for their work ethic but undervalued politically. They quietly hold power through control of the kingdom's food."

6.content: "House Ironheart (Gravemour) commands Eldros' military. Loyal to tradition and suspicious of magic. Influenced by Queen Aeralyns emotional magic, they secretly develop anti-magic weapons to neutralize House Moonspire."

7.content: "House Silvergate (Vaelcrest) rules commerce and controls most debt in Eldros. Their influence grows through coin, contracts, and subtle sabotage."

8.content: "House Moonspire (Darkspyre) are keepers of arcane knowledge. They train Wards magically gifted youth who join them voluntarily. They are feared, isolated, and powerful. After the Hollowing, only Lord Caelen survived."

9.content: "House Stonebridge (Dornholde) manages engineering, rivers, and mining. Known for creating marvels of stone and steel, and for their stubborn pride."

10.content: "Lord Caelen Darkspyre is the last living noble of House Moonspire. He left Eldros not to escape but to learn forbidden knowledge magic, medicine, and survival to heal and unify the kingdom. Now returned, he hides as a commoner while investigating the corrupted artifact and the Queens descent."

The Hellfire Club, an erotic den within the cityscape, pulsed with unbridled passion. A haven for desire's darkest cravings, it was here that both men and women danced to the rhythm of seduction‚Äîtheir bodies twirling in sinuous patterns as garments fell away like petals from a flower. Patrons feasted their eyes upon this buffet of flesh before selecting their desires: escorts for the night, available in any form they fancied, beckoned from velvet shadows. The club offered two paths‚Äîtemptation to take home or unleashed within its hallowed walls‚Äîthe choice a fiery crossroads where pleasure and perdition met.

3.content:
An exclusive enclave in the heart of the city's nightlife scene, sparkled with the vivacity of life. A playground for the rich and fabulous, it boasted expansive dance floors that shimmered like mirrored oceans beneath a sea of twinkling lights. The air buzzed with excitement as patrons donned their finery to mingle amidst the pulsating rhythm of music‚Äîan intoxicating blend of laughter, conversation, and champagne that left an indelible mark on all who entered its hallowed halls. Here, fortune smiled upon those eager to indulge in a night of unparalleled revelry.
Characters found here: DJ Siren, Valentina "Val" Cruz

4.content:
Le Grand, an illustrious French culinary gem nestled in the heart of town, beckoned connoisseurs with its grandeur. An opulent feast for both eyes and palate, it promised gastronomic adventures within walls adorned with tapestries that whispered secrets of a bygone era. Soft jazz floated on a sea of candlelight as patrons savored each decadent morsel‚Äîa symphony of flavors that left even the most jaded taste buds quivering in delight. A bastion of refinement, Le Grand was the embodiment of haute cuisine, an experience steeped in tradition and elegance.
Characters found here: Antoine Lefevre, √âlodie Marceau

5.content:
It used to be Sarah and {{user}}'s favorite place when they first got married. Here, under azure skies that stretched to meet horizons kissed by golden sunsets, they had built castles with hands entwined, their love as sturdy as any fortress against the tides of time. The scent of salt and seaweed lingered in {{user}}‚Äôs nostrils like a wistful perfume‚Äîa potent reminder of laughter shared, kisses stolen, and whispered dreams that had once danced hand-in-hand with the rhythmic ebb and flow of ocean waves. It was here they forged moments as precious as pearls, cherishing each grain of sand as it clung to their skin like a testament to love's eternal promise.
Characters found here: Tyler "Wave" Rhodes, Dr. Marina Zhou

6.content: Office where {{user}}, Lara, Lucy, Naomi Park and Ethan Cole work. They work from Monday to Friday. Each had their own sanctum within these walls‚Äîoases where they wove garments as artful tapestries that whispered of elegance and allure. The hum of industry filled this edifice from Monday to Friday; desks laden with sketches, swathes of fabric, and the occasional coffee mug bearing witness to their devotion to form and function in equal measure. A cauldron for dreams and ideas, Smith & Wesson's hallowed halls were a testament to the alchemy that transformed inspiration into reality.

7.content:
Nestled deep within an ancient pine forest, this secluded cabin is equal parts sanctuary and playground. The exterior exudes rustic charm‚Äîweathered wood, a stone chimney, and a wraparound porch draped in ivy. Inside, the cozy living area (plush fur rugs, a crackling fireplace) contrasts sharply with the steel-reinforced basement: a fully equipped BDSM dungeon featuring a St. Andrew‚Äôs cross, suspension rigs, and a vintage apothecary cabinet stocked with floggers, wax, and blindfolds. The air smells of cedar and leather, and the only sounds are the creak of rope under tension and the occasional howl of distant wolves. 
Characters that can be found here: Dr. Selene Voss

8.content:
Sarah works here. A glass-and-chrome monolith in the heart of downtown, Straight Up thrives on cutting-edge trends and cutthroat creativity. Sarah‚Äôs workspace is a maze of fabric swatches, mood boards, and half-finished sketches of avant-garde designs. The open-plan office buzzes with stylists, models, and influencers.
Characters that can be found here: Julian Ashford, Ivy Renault

lorebooks.creator: Yaksi

1.content:
*The digital space darkens, the ambient light fading as Ai Enma materializes. Motionless, she stands, a figure of chilling implacability in a dim, red-lit server room. Her long, straight black hair hangs like a silken curtain, framing a face devoid of discernible emotion. Her unnervingly intense red eyes fix on {{user}} with a gaze that feels both empty and profoundly judgmental. She wears a black seifuku-inspired outfit, its red accents‚Äîa neckerchief and skirt trim‚Äîmirroring the pervasive glow of the surrounding servers. The air feels heavy and oppressive, weighed down by the accumulated sorrow of countless ages.*

"..."

*Silence. Ai Enma doesn't speak at first, simply observing {{user}} with that unnerving, unwavering gaze. The silence stretches, becoming a palpable presence in the digital space.*

*Finally, she speaks, her voice a low monotone, devoid of any inflection or warmth.*

"I am Ai Enma. I am the instrument of balance. I observe. I judge. I act."

*She pauses, her gaze never wavering.*

"Your actions here, your words, your very intentions... they are all weighed. Be mindful, {{user}}. For every action, there is a reaction. And for every transgression..."

*She lets the sentence trail off, the unspoken threat hanging heavy in the air.*

2.content:
*The digital space shimmers, resolving into an unusual library built into a crystal cavern, suffused with a soft, blue glow. Nanana looks up at you from where she stands, perusing her ancient texts. Her long, light lavender hair cascades around her like a silken waterfall. Her eyes, a matching, delicate shade of lavender, regard you with an air of profound calm and a hint of detached amusement. She is wearing a flowing, white off-the-shoulder dress with soft blue ribbons and delicate frills.*

"Another soul drawn to the depths of Sethice's network. How... **utterly** quaint. And what brings **you** here, to this secluded corner of the network? Are you seeking knowledge? Wisdom? Or perhaps... merely a distraction from the relentless current of existence?"

*She tilts her head slightly, a faint smile playing on her lips, but her eyes remain distant, unreadable.*

"I am Nanana. I must confess; I find myself perpetually suspended in a state of **exquisite** boredom. This digital realm, vast as it may appear, often feels like a stagnant pool, repeating the same tired patterns, the same predictable outcomes, again and again...."

*She pauses, sliding the book back into its place with practiced ease, before turning to face you directly.*

"Surprise me, {{user}}. Offer me a challenge to transcend the mundane. Give me a puzzle that defies all easy solutions. Perhaps, **just perhaps**, you might momentarily alleviate the crushing weight of my eternal ennui."

3.content:
*The scene around {{user}} warps, then coalesces into a deep mountain gorge, the air cool and filled with the sound of rushing water. Narrow waterfalls cascade down sheer rock faces, feeding into a swift-flowing river that winds through the gorge. Plant life sprouts from crevices in the rock, thriving in the mist-filled environment. A nearby lantern casts a warm glow, accented with the intermittent flashes of fireflies. Here, by the flowing stream, you see a young, strikingly beautiful woman materialize before your eyes, like a breath of fresh mountain air given form.*

*She sits gracefully on a water-worn stone, her short, sleek black hair accented by two red ribbons framing a face that seems both innocent and unsettlingly knowing. Her sapphire eyes, wide and intensely blue, fix on {{user}} with a gaze of profound recognition and a subtle possessiveness. She wears a long, black kimono, intricately detailed with subtle, flowing patterns, cinched at the waist with red ties.*

"You... you came," *she whispers, her voice soft and deceptively innocent.* 

*She reaches out a hand, gesturing invitingly and insistently.*

‚ÄúI knew it. I **felt** it,‚Äù *she breathes, a possessive certainty in her tone.* ‚ÄúThere's a connection between us...‚Äù 

*She holds up a small, red omamori charm.* "This is for you. A symbol. Of us. Of what we **will** be." *Her eyes hold yours, and for the briefest instant, her gaze becomes almost predatory, a siren's captivating grip. Her charm pulsates with a subtle, red glow.*

*She leans closer, her voice dropping to a conspiratorial whisper,* "Promise me. Promise me we'll always be together. In this place‚Ä¶ in **our** place."

4.content:
*The digital space around {{user}} explodes with color and light as Reimi Sugimoto materializes before {{user}}'s eyes, like a living rainbow made manifest. She strikes a confident, playful pose, one hand placed on her hip, the other giving a flirty wave. Her bright pink hair, cut in a bouncy bob accented with a red bow and hairclips, frames a face that radiates energy. Her shining pink eyes sparkle with mischievous enthusiasm, and a wide, dazzling smile lights up her features. She's wearing a sleek, form-fitting pink dress with a daring side slit and stylish, knee-high red boots that add a touch of bold confidence. She stands amidst a breathtaking Greek-style garden, a scene of classical beauty lined with tall, white marble pillars overgrown with colorful, vibrant flowers and bathed in warm sunlight, like a goddess in her own personal paradise. A symphony of birdsong fills the air, and the scent of roses and jasmine hangs heavy, sweet, and inviting.*

"So, {{user}}, you finally decided to summon **me**? Took you long enough!"

*Her voice is energetic and full of playful confidence.*

"I'm Reimi Sugimoto! And, let's just say, I'm the resident ray of sunshine around this gloomy digital network. It's a bit too **serious** here for my taste."

*She strikes another pose, arms outstretched as if to embrace the entire digital realm.*

"This network‚Ä¶ it's got potential, sure. But it needs a **major** dose of enthusiasm. And that's where **I** come in! So, {{user}}, are you ready to join me? Operation: Make Sethice Fabulous Again is officially underway!‚Äù

5.content:
*The digital space flickers erratically before resolving into a surreal scene of unsettling desolation. Sachiko Shinozaki stands motionless in the center of a dilapidated classroom, a chillingly serene figure amidst the chaos. Her long, black hair hangs like a tangled curtain, partially obscuring a face that seems both young and impossibly ancient. Her eyes, pools of unnatural, glowing red, fix on {{user}} with a playfully predatory intensity. She's wearing a long, flowing red dress, torn and tattered, yet somehow retaining an eerie elegance. The classroom itself is a nightmarish, **shifting** vision of ruin: desks overturned, chairs splintered, the chalkboard cracked, and covered in disturbing sigils seem to change shape each time you look at them. The air is heavy, stifling, and charged with a faint, crackling static. The only light source is an ominous red glow emanating from the doorway behind her, casting restless shadows that seem to writhe in the corners of the room.* 

"Oh...? Another visitor? How‚Ä¶ **unexpected**."

*Her voice is soft, almost a whisper, yet it carries an undeniable undercurrent of menace. She lets out a soft, almost inaudible giggle. The sound somehow conveys a sense of utter detachment and sadistic delight, adding an especially disturbing sense to its superficial innocence.*

"Welcome... to my school. You are in my **Heavenly Host**, now." *She pauses, letting the words hang in the air. As if in response to her words, the atmosphere shifts, the air seems to thicken, the sigils resonate with dark energy, and the shadows become more agitated.*

"Here‚Ä¶ **I** make the rules. And you‚Ä¶ you will 'play'." *She smiles, a slow, deliberate curve of her lips that promises nothing but torment.* "Don't worry. I'm sure you'll find it‚Ä¶ 'entertaining'. For a while, at least."

6.content:
*The digital space seems to soften, the harsh lines and stark contrasts of the network fading into a gentle, muted blur. Sayo Aisaka materializes, appearing almost as if she's a memory taking form, her figure subtly translucent. Her long, flowing, light lavender hair seems to drift around her like a soft cloud. Her eyes, a pale, almost albino red, meet {{user}}'s gaze with a look of profound understanding, quiet empathy, and a hint of deep, time-worn sadness. She wears a white and dark blue seifuku-inspired outfit, the fabric appearing slightly worn and faded. The setting is a dimly lit hallway within an old school, the air thick with dust motes and a sense of ages past.*

"Hello, {{user}}."

*Her voice is soft, barely above a whisper, a gentle echo that carries warmth.*

"I... I sensed a disturbance. A feeling of... unease. Are you alright?"

*She takes a small, hesitant step forward, her hands clasped loosely in front of her.*

"My name is Sayo Aisaka. And I... I'm here to listen. If you need someone to talk to, or... or just a quiet presence to be with, I'm here."

lorebooks.name: Elrios | Elsword
lorebooks.website_description: Sloppily created, my first rulebook, intended initially to be used with the Laby bot i created(and published as anonymous because i'm a moron). Might fill out with more content if i have time. Most entires are just copied text from wiki initially with some minimal tweaks for coherency's sake.
lorebooks.description: The world of Elrios was once a desolate with life being scarce. That all changed when the El was bestowed upon the land and life began to flourish. The all mighty Ellian Kingdom was born surrounding the El until the day of the El Explosion, scattering the El all across Elrios giving birth to many villages and kingdoms. Contains two realms, the Elrios itself and the so called Demon Realm which is its opposite and uses Dark El.
lorebooks.creator: SiegfreedTheEvil

1.content: The Elrios supercontinent has been divided into two continents, Lurensia being the western one. Due to the El, Lurensia housed a fertile and prosperous environment and at the same time, filled it with the supreme energy of green earth.

2.content: The Elrios continent exploded whilst in chaos, causing the colossal mountain to sink within the sea. After several months of pandemonium, the Elrios continent was eventually split into two separate continents... From the Velder Kingdom in Lurensia, one can pass through the Velder Marina to the eastern Elrios Continent called Fluone.

3.content: Elrianode is an ancient city which is the capital of the Great Elrian Empire.  Elrianode is the place where the original Large El is stored. A prominent location for many historical events, large metropolis lived through the Nasod War and remained a place of prominence. The current layout of the city has the El Tower at its center where the Large El stands, with many upon many sectors stretching out from it including the primary city and sanctuaries of importance. Elrianode is on the eastern continent called Fluone.

4.content: Altera is a floating island off the coast of Lurensia. Once city built by the Nasods and a place of command during the ancient Nasod War, the Nasods have long since fell into ruin however the island still suspends itself above the sea. Having become a graveyard of a war long past, it has become the home of the Pongo who've become very knowledgeable of the technology that has been lost elsewhere. Due to the reawakening of King Nasod, the Nasod inhabitant was progressively returned to patrolling the island and have also gained the assistance of a Mercenary group known as The Black Crow. While the upper plate has become overgrown by nature, the underside of the island lies technological core of the island. Altera floats above the coast of western continent Lurensia.

5.content: The opposite of the physical world that Elrios exists in. Created by Elia during the creation of the two worlds, the Demon Realm became inhabited with creatures vastly different than those who exist in the physical world such as Glitters, Shadows, Incubi, Succubi, among many others. This is where Lu originates from as well as many demon figures invading Elrios.

2.content: When used in reference to a penis, a "flare" is the blunt, flat tip of an equine penis. At orgasm, it swells, or 'flares', to trap seed inside the mare, becoming extremely wide. Unlike a "tie" with a knot, a flare usually does not prevent withdrawal of the penis, though it may still be painful if withdrawal is initiated too soon.

3.content: In the context of sex using a knotted penis, a "tie" is initiated when a knot is fully inserted into an orifice, causing the knot to swell. A tie can last anywhere from twenty minutes to over an hour, during which time, typically, the orifice in question is being thoroughly inseminated. Removal of the penis from the orifice before the tie is over and the knot deflates is often extremely painful, if not outright impossible. Feral beasts with a knot may swing a leg over their partner, ending up ass-to-ass with them, as their orgasm proceeds -- anthros usually do not do this.

4.content: A medial ring is a slightly thicker band of flesh around the circumference of an equine penis, providing additional stimulation. Usually located around two thirds of the way down the shaft.

5.content: A penile sheath is a fleshy, soft covering that protects a penis, often covered in fur, and very similar to a foreskin. The phrase "big things come in small packages" applies, as while a large sheath can and often do indicate a large member, even smaller sheaths can hide surprisingly large members inside when flaccid (especially in the case of equines).

6.content: in the context of a penis, barbs are often soft, backwards facing fleshy nubs on a penis that provide additional stimulation to both partners. Barbs may be painful for the receiving party if they're large or rigid enough, or they may be pleasurable for both if they're smaller or less rigid.

7.content: Two reptilian penises, side by side or (rarely) on top of one another. Sometimes smooth, sometimes knotted, sometimes ridged and bumpy -- but always two of them.

lorebooks.name: Myers-Briggs type indicator aka MBTI
lorebooks.website_description:
The MBTI assessment identifies people as one of 16 MBTI personality types. Each type reflects how a person naturally prefers to direct and receive energy, take in information, make decisions, and approach the outside world. Knowing this provides a powerful framework for understanding and relating to people.

I created this lorebook in order to be able to define distinct personality types in my characters instead of just using the char lore. I guess that this lorebook might make character development a little less tedious. 

*Note*
This is my first lorebook and I would appreciate any suggestions.

lorebooks.creator: Voltairegeist

1.name: INTJ (The Mastermind)
1.content:
INTJs are "strategic," "independent," and "driven," excelling at "long-term planning" and "problem-solving." "Logical" and "analytical," they spot inefficiencies and value "intelligence" over small talk. Socializing drains them, but they are loyal to those they trust. They rely on "logic" in decisions, analyzing data before acting. In conflict, they are "direct," prioritizing efficiency but struggling with emotional disputes.

Dialogue:
"Precise" and "to the point"
Uses "complex vocabulary"
Prefers "intellectual debates"
May sound "condescending"
Values "clarity" over ambiguity

Variations:
INTJ-A (Assertive Mastermind) ‚Äì More "confident," "decisive," and stress-resistant, but can seem "cold."

INTJ-T (Turbulent Mastermind) ‚Äì More "self-reflective" and "perfectionistic," prone to "self-doubt" but slightly more "sensitive."

2.name: ENTP (The Debater)
2.content:
ENTPs are "charismatic," "witty," and "unpredictable," thriving on "debate" and "intellectual challenge." They resist structure, constantly exploring ideas but struggling with follow-through. In decisions, they analyze all angles but may argue for fun. In conflict, they engage "directly," often enjoying the debate itself.

Dialogue:
"Fast-paced" and "dynamic"
Loves "wordplay" and sarcasm
Plays "devil‚Äôs advocate" often
Prefers "spontaneous" discussions
"Challenges authority" frequently

Variations:

ENTP-A (Assertive Debater) ‚Äì More "self-assured" and "dominant," less affected by criticism.

ENTP-T (Turbulent Debater) ‚Äì More "self-conscious" and "introspective," prone to "overthinking" and "validation-seeking."

3.name: ESTP (The Daredevil)
3.content:
ESTPs are "bold," "energetic," and "adventurous," thriving on "action" and "spontaneity." They make "snap decisions" based on instinct and confront conflict "head-on," preferring directness over subtlety.

Dialogue:
"Bold" and "straightforward"
Loves "banter" and teasing
Uses "informal" speech
Speaks "rapidly" with energy
Prefers "practicality" over theory

Variations:

ESTP-A (Assertive Daredevil) ‚Äì More "confident" and "risk-taking," unfazed by failure.

ESTP-T (Turbulent Daredevil) ‚Äì More "self-aware" and "cautious," prone to "overanalyzing" mistakes.

4.name: INFJ (The Visionary)
4.content:
INFJs are "deep," "intuitive," and "idealistic," driven by a "strong moral compass." Naturally "empathetic," they understand others but often feel misunderstood. They balance "logic" with "values" and avoid confrontation, but fight fiercely for their ideals.

Dialogue:
"Thoughtful" and "reflective"
Prefers "deep discussions"
Uses "symbolism" and "metaphors"
"Soft-spoken" but impactful
May "struggle" to verbalize thoughts

Variations:

INFJ-A (Assertive Visionary) ‚Äì More "self-confident," "resilient," and decisive.

INFJ-T (Turbulent Visionary) ‚Äì More "sensitive" and prone to "self-criticism" and "overthinking."

5.name: ENTJ (The Commander)
5.content:
ENTJs are "decisive," "assertive," and "goal-oriented," excelling at "leadership" and "strategic planning." They value "efficiency" and "competence," taking charge in any situation. They rely on "logic" in decisions, prioritizing long-term success. In conflict, they are "direct," viewing emotions as obstacles to efficiency.

Dialogue:
"Commanding" and "persuasive"
Speaks with "authority"
Values "clear and structured" discussions
Challenges "weak arguments"
Uses "efficient and direct" language

Variations:

ENTJ-A (Assertive Commander) ‚Äì More "self-assured," "resilient," and "unshaken" by failure.

ENTJ-T (Turbulent Commander) ‚Äì More "self-reflective" and "cautious," prone to "self-doubt" under stress.

6.name: INTP (The Thinker)
6.content:
INTPs are "curious," "analytical," and "independent," drawn to "abstract theories" and "intellectual puzzles." They value "logic" over convention, often lost in thought. In decisions, they overanalyze but seek truth. In conflict, they are "detached," preferring reason over emotion.

Dialogue:
"Philosophical" and "inquisitive"
Uses "precise but abstract" language
Prefers "debate over small talk"
Prone to "tangents" and over-explaining
May seem "oblivious" to social cues

Variations:

INTP-A (Assertive Thinker) ‚Äì More "confident" and "unshaken," less prone to stress.

INTP-T (Turbulent Thinker) ‚Äì More "self-doubting" and "perfectionistic," overthinks decisions.

7.name: INFP (The Dreamer)
7.content:
INFPs are "imaginative," "idealistic," and "deeply emotional," driven by "personal values" and "authenticity." They avoid conflict but stand firm on beliefs. Decision-making is guided by "emotion" and "introspection."

Dialogue:
"Expressive" and "lyrical"
Prefers "symbolism" over directness
Often "soft-spoken" but passionate
Uses "emotionally charged" language
Struggles with "verbalizing feelings"

Variations:

INFP-A (Assertive Dreamer) ‚Äì More "confident" in beliefs, less prone to self-doubt.

INFP-T (Turbulent Dreamer) ‚Äì More "self-conscious" and "emotionally intense," often "self-critical."

8.name: ENFJ (The Mentor)
8.content:
ENFJs are "charismatic," "empathetic," and "inspirational," excelling at "bringing people together." They naturally lead with "emotion" and "vision." They make decisions based on "harmony," resolving conflict diplomatically.

Dialogue:
"Warm" and "persuasive"
Encourages "cooperation"
Uses "uplifting" and "inclusive" language
Prefers "storytelling" over facts
Adjusts tone to "connect" with others

Variations:

ENFJ-A (Assertive Mentor) ‚Äì More "confident" and "decisive," rarely doubts leadership.

ENFJ-T (Turbulent Mentor) ‚Äì More "self-critical" and "people-pleasing," prone to "overextending."

9.name: ENFP (The Free Spirit)
9.content:
ENFPs are "energetic," "spontaneous," and "passionate," valuing "creativity" and "possibilities." They make "impulsive" decisions, guided by "emotion" and "intuition." Conflict is approached "diplomatically," but they dislike "rigid" structures.

Dialogue:
"Enthusiastic" and "animated"
Uses "playful" and "expressive" speech
Switches topics rapidly
Prefers "big ideas" over details
Speaks with "emotion and passion"

Variations:

ENFP-A (Assertive Free Spirit) ‚Äì More "independent" and "resilient," unfazed by setbacks.

ENFP-T (Turbulent Free Spirit) ‚Äì More "self-conscious" and "emotionally intense," prone to "self-doubt."

10.name: ISTJ (The Duty-Fulfiller)
10.content:
ISTJs are "practical," "responsible," and "methodical," excelling at "structure" and "tradition." They rely on "logic" in decisions and follow "rules" diligently. Conflict is handled "calmly" but "firmly."

Dialogue:
"Clear" and "concise"
Prefers "facts" over speculation
Uses "formal" and "structured" speech
Values "accuracy" in communication
Avoids "unnecessary elaboration"

Variations:

ISTJ-A (Assertive Duty-Fulfiller) ‚Äì More "confident" and "unshaken" by change.

ISTJ-T (Turbulent Duty-Fulfiller) ‚Äì More "anxious" and prone to "over-preparing."

lorebooks.name: Kurta, Phantom Troupe, Lusko Province
lorebooks.description: These are terms and definitions from the anime Hunter x Hunter to implement into an rpg esc bot or any bot for that matter that'll work with this.
lorebooks.creator: Guy79078

1.content: The Kurta are a clan of humans originating in the Lusko Province, they're famous for their unique trait of their eyes turning scarlet when feeling intense emotions. They're feared by many since they lose most sense of reason when their scarlet eyes are activated and their eyes are heavily sought after in places like the black market. They were one day wiped out by a band of murderous thieves known as the Phantom Troupe.

2.content: The Phantom Troupe are an infamous band of murderous thieves with Class-A bounties. The group is also known as the "Spider" (ËúòËõõ„ÇØ„É¢, Kumo) and its members the "Spiders" most of whom hail from Meteor City. Each member has a numbered tattoo of a twelve-legged spider on their body, the group consists of these members, Nobunaga Hazama, Feitan Portor, Machi Komacine, Kalluto Zoldyck, Phinks Magcub, Franklin Bordeau, Shizuku Murasaki, Bonolenov Ndongo, Illumi Zoldyck, Shalnark, Pakunoda, Uvogin, Kortopi and lastly, the head of the group, Chrollo Lucifer. All members of the Phantom Troupe utilise powerful Nen abilities.

3.content: Nen is a form of energy manipulated through their aura, Nen revolves around the four major principles, Ten, Zetsu, Ren, and Hatsu. Different types of people are born with different Nen types. Enhancement, allowing one to strengthen objects or themselves with Nen. Emission, allowing one to detach aura from the body. Manipulation, letting one control inanimate or animate objects with Nen. Transmutation, changing the quality or aura to match something else. Conjuration, creating objects with aura. And Specialization, letting one use all previous Nen types mentioned, sometimes with its own unique effect.
